mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (`no`, `order`, board_no, user_no, content) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(no)+1, 0) FROM comments c), 0, #{boardNo}, #{user.no}, #{content})
INSERT INTO comments (`no`, `order`, board_no, user_no, content) VALUES (#{no}, (SELECT MAX(`order`)+1 FROM comments c WHERE no = #{no}), #{boardNo}, #{user.no}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT c.no no, `order` orderNo, board_no boardNo, content, c.regdate regdate, u.no 'user.no', u.nickname 'user.nickname' FROM comments c JOIN users u ON user_no = u.no WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.no DESC, `order` ASC LIMIT #{page.startContent}, #{page.contentCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
